name: Batak Kingdom Defense
description:
A download able game for android

Batak Kingdom Defense is a game genre tower defense made by Saud Maruli Sihombing A.K.A RocketBrain 2016!

it's about a story from indonesia north sumatra, which tells the story of the battle Batak tribe of north sumatra whit dutch.
